title: Why I can't launch LoL on my fiber internet? I can launch it on my mobile internet. What happen?
body:
Hello, Riot, Are you there?
I have a problem and let me explain you first.
I am Asian who live in Asia, Myanmar Country.
I played LoL for 3 years over and I never got this problem.
Problem is happened when I saw a notification on my client " We are working on club and fix ".
After I saw this notification and I close my client to rest. And I open it again.
Now, there is only appear just the League of Legends Logo and happen nothing. When I click on that logo and show me the pop up " PVP.net is not responding ". It is happen for me in this a few days ago and now.
Not launching the LOL Patcher and also i can't see the button "Launch" because that is stopping on showing the logo League of legends.
By the way, I use two type of connections to play League of Legends. One is from the our Local ISP's fiber internet and another is my mobile internet.
It is happen when I start to play League of Legends on fiber internet. That is not only for LoL client. I aslo can't open www.leagueoflegends.com on my Chrome browser. So, I try it with my mobile internet. With mobile internet, all the things is okay and nothing happen. 
So, Let me know, what should I do? My Fiber internet is still work and can play another online game and can open a lot of websites. Mobile Internet is so expensive and so pain for me to play League of legends.

Sorry for my poor English. 
Please Help me.
I can't stop playing League of Legends.

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be having a series of issues here, ranging from connection to permission issues.  As a start, if you are stuck at the logo then your settings might be blocking the patcher from opening.  For this specific issue, I suggest using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access.

Your network could also have problems connecting to our various servers, and we can troubleshoot this but keep in mind you also have a physical distance from the servers that will cause some strain.  You can use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is strong, but again your physical distance will also be an obstacle.  Hope that helps!
I follow your way to fix my connection, still can't open. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
